source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 524,816 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 265,948.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 74,301 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,345 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

Transmogrified to:
Tabard of the Dragonmaw Clan
